title: Subchapter B - Harness Racing
content:

Part 4101 - Licenses

Part 4115 - Starter And Starting (§ 4115.1 to 4115.13)

Part 4116 - Drivers (§ 4116.1 to 4116.12)

Part 4117 - Racing And Track Rules (§ 4117.1 to 4117.17)

Part 4118 - Purses And Conditions (§ 4118.1 to 4118.10)

Part 4119 - Decorum (§ 4119.1 to 4119.11)

Part 4120 - Payment Of Prizes (§ 4120.1 to 4120.19)

Part 4121 - Protests And Appeals (§ 4121.1 to 4121.5)

Part 4123 - Voluntary Exclusion From Racetracks And Restriction On Telephone Account Wagering

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
